long: Meaning: properly, "like this", i.e. by implication, (of manner) "thus" (or "so"); also (of place) "here" (or "hither"); or (of time) "now".  Usage: also, here,   hitherto, like, on the other side, so (and much), such, on that manner, (on) this (manner, side, way, way and that way),   mean while, yonder.  Source: from the prefix k and "H1931";
